definition: state of play in a game of chess/(old) chessboard
chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: If the position is equal, then playing too hard for the advantage is risky.
sentences.chinese: 棋局爲均勢時，若要花太多力量去搶優勢是危險的。

sentences.english: In life, as in chess, forethought wins.
sentences.chinese: 生活就像棋局，提前想好纔會贏。

sentences.english: Once the game is over, the King and the pawn go back in the same box.
sentences.chinese: 棋局結束時，國王和卒子都得放回棋盒裏。

sentences.english: The little boy tried his hand at chess.
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩在棋局上試手。

sentences.english: Is that because my dull eye can not see through the secret.
sentences.chinese: 是我遲鈍而麻木的眼睛沒有洞穿這棋局。

sentences.english: But the wise advance every step with confidence.
sentences.chinese: 世事如棋局局新，智慧人的每一步都走出自信心。

sentences.english: Chess game can be one of favorite activity people enjoys in free time.
sentences.chinese: 棋局可以是一個人最喜歡的活動中享有的自由時間。

definition: kifu (record of a game of go or shogi)
see 蓮花落|莲花落[lian2 hua1 lao4]
draw or tie in chess etc/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
